comments:
When starting Eclipse 3.2 I get an error "Error notifying a perference change listner.  Check the log for details."

The OK button does not get rid of the error message, but when I use the Windows Task Manager th close the task I get a messsage saying JVM terminated.  Exit code = 1073807364

The last log entry starts out as follows:

!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui.workbench 4 2 2006-08-22 11:54:50.417
!MESSAGE Problems occurred when invoking code from plug-in: "org.eclipse.ui.workbench".
!STACK 0
java.lang.NullPointerException
    at org.eclipse.cdt.internal.ui.text.CTextTools.adaptToPreferenceChange(CTextTools.java:238)
    at org.eclipse.cdt.internal.ui.text.CTextTools$PreferenceListener.propertyChange(CTextTools.java:38)
    at org.eclipse.ui.preferences.ScopedPreferenceStore$3.run(ScopedPreferenceStore.java:372)
    at org.eclipse.core.runtime.SafeRunner.run(SafeRunner.java:37)
    at org.eclipse.ui.preferences.ScopedPreferenceStore.firePropertyChangeEvent(ScopedPreferenceStore.java:369)
    at org.eclipse.ui.preferences.ScopedPreferenceStore.setToDefault(ScopedPreferenceStore.java:663)
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 134608 ***

(In reply to comment #2)
> 
> *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 134608 ***
> 

This bug occured in version 3.1.  Bug 134608 was resolved in version 3.1.

(In reply to comment #3)

> > 
> > *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 134608 ***
> > 
> This bug occured in version 3.1.  Bug 134608 was resolved in version 3.1.

If this happens with CDT 3.1, then please attach a stacktrace from CDT 3.1.
The stacktrace you provided in comment 0 is from CDT 3.0.x:

> org.eclipse.cdt.internal.ui.text.CTextTools.adaptToPreferenceChange(CTextTools.java:238)

Line 238 in CTextTools.java of CDT 3.1 is a comment line.

Please make sure you are actually using CDT 3.1. You can check this using the About dialog (Help > About Eclipse SDK). Click on "Feature Details" and search for the CDT feature. Its version should be 3.1.0.200606261600.
Thank you.
